version_description:
**NEW**
+ Export your data in either Markdown or CSV formats

This is a small quality-of-life update I wanted to get out before diving deep on some larger features. Your data is always 100% yours and now that's actually true in the app :)

If you have any questions or issues, don't hesitate to email me: feedback@sofahq.com

- Shawn

***NEW***
• Brand new visual design
• Quick List: A place to put things you’re not ready to organize yet
• You can now add items directly to Activity
• Lists are now sorted alphabetically

***IMPROVED***
• Improved access to Activity
• You can now see more lists at one time, almost double!
• More consistent animations and taptic feedback
• Improved Voice Over support

There are more great updates in the works, so stay tuned.

We hope Sofa is helping you remember what to watch, read, and listen to. If you have any thoughts or feedback send us an email at feedback@sofahq.com. We’d love to hear from you.

SECTIONS
Group your lists into sections for even more organization.

SIRI SHORTCUTS
Quickly add a book, movie, tv show, or podcast by saying, "Hey Siri, add a book." This needs to be setup in the Settings > Siri.

** NEW IN 2.7.1
- Fixed a bug that caused some video game searches to not return any results

** NEW IN 2.7
I’m really excited for this release. There are an enormous amount of ways that you can spend your downtime. So far, Sofa has been able to help you with a few of those: books, movies & TV, and podcasts. Today we are adding a few more to that list.

MUSIC ALBUMS
Search for and add music albums to your lists. You can search by album title or artist.

VIDEO GAMES
Search for and add video games to your lists. Search by video game title.

DYNAMIC TYPE SUPPORT
Sofa now respects your iPhone font size settings. Whether you prefer super tiny or extra large text, it will look great in Sofa.

IMPROVEMENTS
You’ll notice a bunch a small UI improvements and polish throughout the app

BUG FIXES
- Fixed a bug that allowed you to delete your Quick List and Activity. You shouldn’t be able to do that. If you accidentally did that in the past, this update will bring those lists back.

THANK YOU
I truly thank you for supporting Sofa. If you have feedback or any thoughts you’d like to share, please reach out: feedback@sofahq.com.

IMPROVEMENTS
• Under the hood improvements to set up for some future features
• Added dynamic type to empty screens (search and empty lists)
• Small UI improvements

**NEW**
Themes! Classic, Dark, and Black. Change your theme by going to Settings > Change Theme in the app.

**GET IN TOUCH**
Have questions or feedback? I’d love to hear from you. Send an email over to feedback@sofahq.com

**BUG FIX**
• Fixed some issues with theme colors not looking their best

**NEW: Reorder All The Things**
+ Can you say "finally"? You can now put sections, lists, and list items into any order you'd like. Tap "Edit", then drag and drop.
+ The cover image for lists now uses the *first* item in the list, instead of the last.
+ To reorder sections, you can long-press on a section title or tap the ••• button

**FIXES**
- Fixed a bug where the wrong section would be deleted if it had the same title as another section. Wow.
- Fixed issue where you couldn't close the Quick Menu when using Voice Over
- Fixed a few more visual bugs related to themes

I appreciate everyone's patience with this feature. Sometimes things take longer than expected, but hopefully it's worth the wait.

If you have any questions or issues, don't hesitate to email me: feedback@sofahq.com

- Shawn

Updates and fixes for iOS 13

**UPDATES**
+ System dark mode support: Sofa's theme will now follow your system appearance settings.
+ Context menus: long press on lists and list items for additional actions.
+ Sofa now requires iOS 12.4

**FIXES**
- Fixed animation bug when dismissing the quick add menu
- Fixed bug where + button would disappear from search results after navigating to detail view
- Fixed theme color issues in a few places

If you have any questions or issues, don't hesitate to email me: feedback@sofahq.com

- Shawn

**NEW**
+ Export your data in either Markdown or CSV formats

This is a small quality-of-life update I wanted to get out before diving deep on some larger features. Your data is always 100% yours and now that's actually true in the app :)

If you have any questions or issues, don't hesitate to email me: feedback@sofahq.com

- Shawn

Hey gang! This is a BIG release and I'm super excited to share it with you. Let's get into it...

iPAD APP
You can now enjoy Sofa with your iPad! This includes multitasking, multiple windows, keyboard, and mouse support.

iCLOUD SYNCING
All your data will now sync to iCloud. This brings a lot of safety to your data and will allow you to sync it between your iPhone and iPad.

30+ THEMES
There are now a ton of themes to choose from to personalize how Sofa looks. This is also the main way you can support Sofa's development. Have fun!

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS
• New design that uses a tab bar which makes it much easier to get around
• Groups: Organize all your lists into groups and browse each group individually or all at once
• You can now change the date of activity items...finally
• A slew of other UI improvements and bug fixes

---

I have a bunch of other improvements on deck for future releases so stay tuned. If you have any questions or feedback don't hestiate to reach out to feedback@sofahq.com

Thanks!
- Shawn

Hey gang, this is a quick follow-up release for fixing bugs and polishing some rough edges. Thanks so much for the great feedback so far. I really appreciate it!

**IMPROVEMENTS**
• Small improvements to video game search results
• Improvements to iPad keyboard navigation in the lists tab

**BUG FIXES**
• Fixed a an issue where theme purchases weren't properly restoring
• Fixed crash when exporting your data on iPad
• Fixed crash when using the keyboard to navigate lists with empty groups

---

If you have any questions or feedback don't hestiate to reach out to feedback@sofahq.com

Thanks!
- Shawn

**NEW FEATURE**
Most of the time when you search, you find exactly what you're looking for. I know it's been annoying when Sofa doesn't have the book or video game you want to add. Well, that's no longer an issue.

I'm happy to announce you can now add custom books, movies, tv shows, podcasts, music albums, and video games to your lists! Woot woot!

You'll see a new "Add Custom..." button after you search. Tap that button if you can't find the thing you're trying to add.

**NEW THEMES**
Added some new themes to get you through the Summer. You can find these themes in the "Summer" category:
• Home Plate - for all you baseball fans
• Picnic - for those beautiful summer days with the people you love
• Thunderstorm - for those cozy days inside

**BUG FIXES**
• Fixed crash on launch for iPhone SE users
• Fixed an issue when the order of list items would get messed up after deleting other ones

- Fixed a crash when adding an item to Activity from a detail screen
